meanings.definition: A person who commits, especially a criminal.
meanings.sent1: The committer was caught stealing from the store.
meanings.sent2: The police are searching for the committer of the crime.
meanings.sent3: The committer tried to steal a cookie from the cookie jar but got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The committer of the crime left behind a trail of evidence.
meanings.sent5: The committer's actions led to their arrest.

meanings.definition: One who commits to a particular course of action.
meanings.sent1: As a committer to exercise, she never misses her morning run.
meanings.sent2: The committer of the project ensured it was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The committer to healthy eating couldn't resist the temptation of chocolate cake.
meanings.sent4: She is a committer to her goal of learning a new language.
meanings.sent5: The committer to saving money always looks for discounts.

meanings.definition: A person who commits code changes to a version control system.
meanings.sent1: The committer pushed the latest code changes to the repository.
meanings.sent2: The software development team has a dedicated committer for each project.
meanings.sent3: The committer accidentally merged the wrong branch and caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The committer's attention to detail ensures smooth integration of code.
meanings.sent5: The committer's expertise in version control is highly valued by the team.
